sourcesContent:
<template>
  <modal class="blog-post" v-if="data" :settings="settings">
    <blog-post slot="body" :data="data" />
  </modal>
</template>
<script>
import Modal from '~common/Modal';
import BlogPost from '@/components/Blog/BlogPost';
import { getBlogPost } from '@/services/blog.service';

export default {
  props: {
    id: {
      required: true
    }
  },
  components: {
    Modal,
    BlogPost
  },
  data() {
    return {
      data: null,
      settings: {
        hideHeader: true,
        /*@TODO set to false if needed*/
        show: true
      }
    };
  },
  methods: {
    async getData() {
      try {
        this.data = await getBlogPost(this.id);
      } catch (e) {
        return false;
      }
    }
  },
  async mounted() {
    await this.getData();
  }
};
</script>
<style lang="scss" scoped>
.blog-post {
  &-header {
    margin: 0 var(--element-margin-l);
  }
  &-body {
    &__image {
      width: 100%;
      height: auto;
      object-fit: cover;
    }
    &__content {
      color: var(--text-primary);
      font-size: var(--size-regular);
      line-height: 1.3em;
      margin: var(--element-margin-l);
    }
  }
}
</style>
